dc_title_s: A   vision of Britain through time
dc_description_s: A vision of Britain between 1801 and 2001. Including maps, statistical trends and historical descriptions. This collection contains shapefiles related to the Vision of Britain through Time project.
dc_publisher_s: Great Britain Historical GIS Project , Dept. of Geography, University of Portsmouth
